<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Final Words](/Hazards.aspx?ID=142)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 65</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

As a creature touches a hand-written letter, they witness the letter's author scribe it in the past; each pen stroke across the page carves the letter's text into the creature's flesh.

---

**Stealth**
DC 22 (trained) to hear the scratch of a quill upon paper

**Disable**
DC 24 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (trained) to ward off the haunt or DC 25 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (trained) to dispose of the letter with extreme care before the haunt can form

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Carve in Flesh** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Trigger** A creature reads the letter; **Effect** The haunt deals 2d8+11 slashing damage to the triggering creature as the words are carved into its flesh (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). On a failure, the creature takes 2d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

---
**Reset**
1 minute
